headline.main: Mrs. Pennock Leaving War Mobilization Post

lead_paragraph: ALBANY, Aug. 2 (AP) -- Mrs. Winthrop Pennock, director of the State War Council's Office of Civilian Mobilization for the last two years, will leave the $5,000-a-year post Sept. 1 to become executive secretary of the Association of Junior Leagues in America.
abstract: Mrs W Pennock, Civilian Mobilization Office dir, resigns

keywords.name: organizations
